executable.title: T1Mapping
executable.description: T1 mapping estimates effective tissue parameter maps (T1) from multi-spectral FLASH MRI scans with different flip angles.
executable.contributor: Xiao Da (MGH), Yangming Ou (MGH), Andriy Fedorov (BWH), Jayashree Kalpathy-Cramer (MGH)
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NA-MIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, and by National Cancer Institute as part of the Quantitative Imaging Network initiative (U01CA154601) and QIICR (U24CA180918).

image.name: imageName
image.label: Input image
image.description: Input multi-spectral FLASH MRI multivolume image

string-enumeration.name: modelName
string-enumeration.label: Model
string-enumeration.description: Select the mathematical model used to fit the data

image.name: maskName
image.label: Input mask
image.description: Input mask. Optional; if not specified, fitting will be done at all voxels.

integer-vector.name: FAToInclude
integer-vector.label: Flip Angles to include
integer-vector.description: List of integers corresponding to the Flip Angles that should be included in fitting data. Note that only one of the two lists (inlusion or exclusion) should be populated, or both can be empty, in which case all Flip Angles will be used. Optional; if not defined, all Flip Angles will be used.

integer-vector.name: FAToExclude
integer-vector.label: Flip Angles to exclude
integer-vector.description: List of integers corresponding to the Flip Angles that should be excluded from fitting data. Note that only one of the two lists (inlusion or exclusion) should be populated, or both can be empty, in which case all Flip Angles will be used. Optional; if not defined, all Flip Angles will be used.

image.name: fittedVolumeFileName
image.label: Fitted volume
image.description: Output volume containing the values of the fitted function

image.name: rsqrVolumeFileName
image.label: Quality of fit volume
image.description: Output volume containing the R^2 measure of the quality of fit
